core.req

Class Request

  • java.lang.Object
    • core.req.Message
      • core.req.Request
  • Direct Known Subclasses:
    ReadRequest, WriteRequest

    public abstract class Request
extends Message
    Defines functionality for a request message

    • Constructor Summary

      Constructors 
      Constructor and Description
      Request(byte[] data)
      Sets the request information passed in as a byte array
      Request(OpCode code, java.lang.String filename)
      Sets the request information

    • Method Summary

      All Methods Instance Methods Concrete Methods 
      Modifier and Type Method and Description
      protected void decode(byte[] data)
      The method verifies the byte list is in a valid form for a request packet If verified, it decodes the filename and transfer mode into Strings that are locally stored

      Gets the filename
      RequestMode getMode()
      Gets the transfer mode
      void setFilename(java.lang.String filename)
      Sets the filename
      void setMode(RequestMode mode)
      Sets the transfer mode
      byte[] toBytes()
      Writes the data to a byte stream and returns it as a byte array
      java.lang.String toString()
      Returns a string representation of the data contained in the message

      • decode

        protected void decode(byte[] data)
               throws InvalidMessageException
        The method verifies the byte list is in a valid form for a request packet If verified, it decodes the filename and transfer mode into Strings that are locally stored
        Overrides:
        decode in class Message
        Parameters:
        data - - A byte list to decode
        Throws:
        InvalidMessageException - - If the given bytes do not form a valid messsage
